title: Sri Lanka seeks India’s help to secure bridge financing amid economic crisis - Hindustan Times
content: Sri Lanka seeks India’s help to secure bridge financing amid economic crisis  Hindustan TimesView Full coverage on Google News
description: Sri Lanka’s process of negotiating a bailout with the International Monetary Fund (IMF) is expected to take at least six months, if not more. In the interim, the island nation will have to work out a bridge financing arrangement to take care of its immediate needs.
